code: import React from'react';import classNames from'classnames';import images from'utils/images';const items={melee:['dagger','bat','bottle','golfclub','knuckle','knife'],handguns:['pistol','pistol50','snspistol','vintagepistol','revolver','doubleaction','machinepistol','microsmg','minismg','smg','combatpdw','assaultsmg'],rifles:['compactrifle','assaultrifle','carbinerifle','advancedrifle','specialcarbine'],shotguns:['sawnoffshotgun','pumpshotgun','assaultshotgun','heavyshotgun','musket','dbshotgun']};export default function WeaponsList(_ref){let{category,selected,selectItem}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"weapons_list"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"weapons_list-container"},items[category].map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:classNames('weapons_list-item',{active:item===selected}),key:item,onClick:()=>selectItem(item)},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("img",{src:images.getImage("".concat(item,".png"),'inventory'),alt:item})))));}
